summary: An ambitious scholar becomes the ambassador of Sarkan, a southeast Asian country where civil war is brewing.
cast: Marlon Brando|Eiji Okada|Sandra Church|Pat Hingle|Arthur Hill|Jocelyn Brando|Kukrit Pramoj|Judson Pratt|Reiko Sato|George Shibata|Judson Laire|Philip Ober|Yee Tak Yip|Carl Benton Reid|Simon Scott|Frances Helm|James Yagi|John Daheim|Leon Lontoc|Bill Stout|Stefan Schnabel|Leon Alton|Benjie Bancroft|John Barton|Ray Beltram|Ralph Brooks|David Chow|Roy Damron|George DeNormand|Kenneth Gibson|Raven Grey Eagle|Stuart Hall|Shep Houghton|Michael Jeffers|Paul King|Joseph La Cava|Esther Ying Lee|David McMahon|William Meader|Harold Miller|William Mims|Mike Monteleone|Murray Pollack|Paul Power|Don Ross|Jerry Rush|Bernard Sell|Norman Stevans|Bert Stevens|Jack Tornek|Jerry Velasco|Ron Veto
title: Su excelencia el embajador
